contents.title: UH Building Security
contents.description: Explore application designs to improve security for UH buildings with lower personnel costs.

contents.title: COVID-19 ChatBot
contents.description: Implement a ChatBot to provide up-to-date information and encourage healthy behaviors regarding COVID-19.

contents.title: Family Resource Directory
contents.description: Provide an integrated portal to support services, resources, and benefits available to family and children by all governnment and non-profit agencies.

contents.title: Gamify Hawaii Historical Records Indexing
contents.description: Design game mechanics to increase community interest in indexing historic records to improve research on personal history, heritage, and culture

contents.title: Hawaii State IT Visualization
contents.description: Provide a visualization tool for public access to the State of Hawaii's portfolio of major IT software systems and application.

contents.title: UH campus occupancy visualization
contents.description: Use WiFi access point data to visualize and interpret campus occupancy trends to better support health and safety during COVID-19.

contents.name: Videography
contents.description: The process or art of making video films.

contents.name: User Interface Design
contents.description: The process of making interfaces in software or computerized devices with a focus on looks or style.

contents.name: Database Management
contents.description: The data storage, operations and security practices of a Database Administrator (DBA), throughout the life cycle of the data.

contents.name: Java
contents.description: Java is a general-purpose programming language that is class-based, object-oriented, and designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

contents.name: Postgres
contents.description: PostgreSQL, also known as Postgres, is a free and open-source relational database management system emphasizing extensibility and SQL compliance.

contents.name: Meteor
contents.description: Meteor, or MeteorJS, is a free and open-source isomorphic JavaScript web framework written using Node.js.
